content: i designed this handmade piece as a donation to a nearby buddhist temple for their fundraising event the charms are made with shrinky dinks featuring little monks and lotus flowers to symbolize buddhist values and temple culture each one contains a mugwort herbal sachet inside in celebration of the dragon boat festival and its tradition of warding off evil you re also welcome to choose your own meaningful images to create a charm that s uniquely yours 我設計這個手作小物，是為了捐贈給附近的一間佛寺，用於他們的募款活動。 吊飾是使用熱縮片（shrinky dinks）製作，圖案為小沙彌與蓮花，象徵佛教精神與佛寺文化。 內部特別放入了艾草茶包，呼應端午節驅邪避穢的傳統。 你也可以選擇自己喜愛或有意義的圖案，創作出專屬的祈福吊飾。
